name: David Leon RILEY, petitioner, v. CALIFORNIA.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
David Leon RILEY, petitioner,
v.
CALIFORNIA.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Fourth Appellate District, Division One, granted limited to the following question: Whether evidence admitted at petitioner's trial was obtained in a search of petitioner's cell phone that violated petitioner's Fourth Amendment rights.
casebody.head_matter:
David Leon RILEY, petitioner,
v.
CALIFORNIA.
No. 13-132.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 17, 2014.
Case below, 2013 WL 475242.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Fourth Appellate District, Division One, granted limited to the following question: Whether evidence admitted at petitioner's trial was obtained in a search of petitioner's cell phone that violated petitioner's Fourth Amendment rights.
